casebody.data:
RIBELIN
v.
CREEL. No. 112A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Robert L. Inge, Salisbury, for Creel, Phillip Ray. Phillip Creel, for Creel, Phillip Ray. Arlaine Rockey, Marshall, for Ribelin, Dana Marie (fka Creel).

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of April 2015 by Plaintiff-Appellant to Amend Petition for Writ of Certiorari and Amended Motion to Deem Timely Filed to Replace Court of Appeals Opinion:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
